name: Cow Surgeon
description:
Use detection methods to diagnosis your patients. Then treat those poor cows! Save as many cows possible before the timer runs out.

How to Play:

  • Click to select the detection method, then pass the mouse over the cow to find the diseases. 
  • Select a treatment tool, and eliminate the problem with it.
  • Infections must be treated with medicine, parasites plucked out and broken bones melded together.
